Now available: 
Lord of the Rings - The Two Towers - The Purist Edit 

The original fanedit of TTT finally available for download!

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3689662

Well, I've watched the first 2.20hrs and I have to say I'm less than impressed. Some bad editing going on here, not seamless and jarring. Especially plonking the credits in half way through. The editing has done nothing for the pace, although it tried.

I concur above - WHY WMV?!??! Had to split this up and convert to DVD.

If you liked the idea behind this, check this out too:
